80012 Pärnu linn, 
Pärnu linn, Pärnumaa 
EST

description.en: Sustainable tourism development, its patterns, principles and their practical application in tourism management. Strengths and challenges of tourism as a tool for sustainable development. Key actors in the sustainable tourism.
description.et: Kestliku turismi arengu põhimõtted ja selle rakendamine. Turismi kui kestliku arengu vahendi tugevused ja väljakutsed. Sidusrühmad kestlikus turismis.

objectives.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the patterns and concepts of sustainable tourism development, the principles of sustainable tourism management, and their application in different types of tourism, as well as to discuss the barriers and challenges of sustainable development that arise in the tourism industry.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on tutvustada kestliku turismi arengu kontseptsioone, kestliku turismi juhtimise põhimõtteid ja nende rakendamist ning kestliku turismi takistusi ja väljakutseid.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) understands the different dimensions of sustainable tourism, including social, economic, and environmental aspects;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) mõistab kestliku turismi tunnuseid, sh sotsiaalseid, majanduslikke ja keskkonnaalaseid;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) determines the goals, strengths, and obstacles of sustainable tourism development;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) määrab turismi kestliku arendamise eesmärgid, tugevused ja takistused;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) identifies the key actors in sustainable tourism to understand the role and possibilities of each stakeholder in contributing to the development of sustainable tourism.
learning_outcomes.et: 3) tuvastab kestliku turismi võtmeisikud, et mõista iga osalise rolli ja võimalusi turismi kestlikul arendamisel.
